Backing up Kallithea¶

Settings¶

Just copy your .ini file, it contains all Kallithea settings.

Whoosh index¶

Whoosh index is located in /data/index directory where you installed Kallithea ie. the same place where the ini file is located

Database¶

When using sqlite just copy kallithea.db. Any other database engine requires a manual backup operation.

Database backup will contain all gathered statistics
